bill.title: Relating to substance use disorder treatment services; prescribing an effective date.
bill.description: Authorizes county governing bodies to establish county courthouse colocated drug and alcohol abuse treatment services and treatment navigation services in county courthouses and to apply to Oregon Health Authority for grant funds to recoup costs of establishing courthouse colocated treatment and treatment navigation services. Authorizes county governing bodies to establish county courthouse colocated drug and alcohol abuse treatment services and treatment navigation services in county courthouses and to apply to Oregon Health Authority for grant funds to recoup costs of establishing courthouse colocated treatment and treatment navigation services. Directs Oregon Health Authority to establish criteria for courthouse colocated treatment and treatment navigation services and to award grants to counties that operate colocated treatment and treatment navigation services that meet criteria. Dedicates moneys from Oregon Marijuana Account to fund grants. Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.
